weekly_top_story.headline: CMS Launches Advancing Chronic Care with Effective, Scalable Solutions (ACCESS) Model
weekly_top_story.summary: CMS introduced a voluntary 10-year initiative on December 1, 2025, to expand technology-supported care and outcome-based payments for chronic conditions like diabetes and hypertension in Original Medicare, potentially transforming care delivery for millions of beneficiaries starting July 2026.

stories.headline: Revenue Cycle and Payer News - December 24, 2025
stories.summary: Key payer developments include Anthem Blue Cross and Premier Health's multi-year agreement to advance affordable care in Ohio, Humana's new contract with Trinity Health systems, and Aetna's initiatives to simplify experiences for healthcare professionals amid soaring ACA premiums.

stories.headline: Covered California Encourages All Californians to Explore Health Insurance Options Before Dec. 31 Deadline
stories.summary: Covered California reports a 30% drop in 2026 enrollments due to expiring enhanced ACA subsidies, urging action by December 31 to avoid premium hikes and protect access to preventive care for over 1.2 million eligible uninsured residents.
